parameters.query: SELECT mc.id, mc.channel_id, mc.country_code, mc.timezone, cs.best_posting_hours, cs.worst_posting_hours, cs.avg_views_by_hour FROM media_channels mc LEFT JOIN channel_statistics cs ON mc.id = cs.channel_id WHERE mc.id = $1 OR mc.youtube_channel_id = $2

SELECT cq.id, cq.channel_id, cq.content_id, cq.content_type, cq.scheduled_time, mc.country_code, mc.timezone FROM content_queue cq JOIN media_channels mc ON cq.channel_id = mc.id WHERE cq.status = 'pending' AND cq.scheduled_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cq.scheduled_time ASC LIMIT 50
UPDATE content_queue SET scheduled_time = $2, randomization_applied = TRUE, randomization_offset_min = $3 WHERE id = $1
INSERT INTO randomization_logs (content_id, channel_id, original_time, randomized_time, offset_minutes, applied_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, NOW())
